Module lanat
Package lanat.argumentTypes

Class FileArgumentType

java.lang.Object
lanat.utils.ErrorsContainerImpl<Error.CustomError>
lanat.ArgumentType<File>
lanat.argumentTypes.FileArgumentType
All Implemented Interfaces:
Parseable<File>, NamedWithDescription, ParentElementGetter<ArgumentType<?>>, ErrorsContainer<Error.CustomError>, Resettable
public class FileArgumentType extends ArgumentType<File>
An argument type that takes a file path and returns a File instance representing it. This argument type can also check if the file exists and if it is a regular file or a directory.
See Also:
